description:
Yuusaku manages to capture the the Mysterious Lifeform as he pursues the hacker group "the Knights of Hanoi." To defeat the Knights, he logs in to the VR space "LINK VRAINS" as "Playmaker" and challenges them to a Duel with the Mysterious Lifeform as a hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Greif nach dem Wind! Storm Access
